title: What’s Peter Sagan Doing Nowadays? Former World Champion Fails to Impress in ‘Let’s Dance’ Debut
content:
Sagan starts new chapter in wacky post-retirement career with star role in celebrity dance show: 'I’ve never danced and I couldn’t even imagine I could.'

Read the full article at What’s Peter Sagan Doing Nowadays? Former World Champion Fails to Impress in ‘Let’s Dance’ Debut on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
